movement.map

Class DijkstraPathFinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • movement.map.DijkstraPathFinder

  • public class DijkstraPathFinder
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the Dijkstra's shortest path algorithm.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  DijkstraPathFinder.DistanceComparator
      Comparator that compares two map nodes by their distance from the source node.
      private class  DijkstraPathFinder.DistanceMap
      Simple Map implementation for storing distances.

    • Field Summary

      Value for infinite distance

      private static int PQ_INIT_SIZE
      Initial size of the priority queue
      private java.util.Map<MapNode,MapNode> prevNodes
      Map of previous nodes on the shortest path(s)
      private java.util.Queue<MapNode> unvisited
      Priority queue of unvisited nodes discovered so far
      private java.util.Set<MapNode> visited
      Set of already visited nodes (where the shortest path is known)

      • getShortestPath

        public java.util.List<MapNode> getShortestPath(MapNode from,
                                               MapNode to)
        Finds and returns a shortest path between two map nodes
        Parameters:
        from - The source of the path
        to - The destination of the path
        Returns:
        a shortest path between the source and destination nodes in a list of MapNodes or an empty list if such path is not available

      • relax

        private void relax(MapNode node)
        Relaxes the neighbors of a node (updates the shortest distances).
        Parameters:
        node - The node whose neighbors are relaxed

        Parameters:

        distance - The distance of the node from the source node
